text: Rafael Joaquín Trujillo Villar (born 14 December 1975 in La Línea de la Concepción, Cádiz)Sailor profiles Rafael Trujillo, ESP is a Spanish sailor of the Finn class and Olympic medalist.ISAF profile He won the Finn Gold Cup once and competed in four straight Olympic Games, winning a silver medal in Athens 2004. He sailed with +39 Challenge in the 2007 Louis Vuitton Cup. Trujillo was also part of the Mapfre yacht in the 2014–15 Volvo Ocean Race,Rafael Trujillo Villar and coaches 2013 world champion Jorge Zarif.Rafael Trujillo wins first Finn World Masters in Torbole ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Spain Category:People from La Línea de la Concepción Category:Andalusian sportspeople Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2012 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Olympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Olympic medalists in sailing Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Volvo Ocean Race sailors Category:2007 America's Cup sailors Category:Finn class world champions Category:World champions in sailing for Spain
title: Rafael Trujillo (sailor)
